DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine safe use tolerance peptide-based formula child gastrointestinal dysfunction and/or feed intolerance .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safe Use Tolerance Peptide-based Formula Pediatric Population
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female 1 13 year age . Subject diagnose gastrointestinal dysfunction and/or feed intolerance . Subject require enteral tube feed sole source nutrition . History diabetes . Requires artificial ventilation . Requires parenteral nutrition . Subject intestinal obstruction . Subject receive dialysis treatment . Subject allergy intolerance ingredient study product .
